lead_paragraph: “I’m not a person that digs deep into analytics because I don’t think the sport of soccer is an analytic sport,” Arena said, offering a contrast with Jurgen Klinsmann.

headline.print_headline: New Coach Outlines Different Path for U.S. Team
headline.main: Bruce Arena Outlines a New Vision for the U.S. Team

snippet: “I’m not a person that digs deep into analytics because I don’t think the sport of soccer is an analytic sport,” Arena said, offering a contrast with Jurgen Klinsmann....
abstract: Bruce Arena, recently rehired to coach United States men's national soccer team, presents his plan for helping flagging team recover in time to qualify for 2018 World Cup.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
